trans-unit.source: Step 1: Sign up for an Account for the REST Tutorial
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Sign up for an Account for the REST Tutorial

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Sign up for an Account for the REST Tutorial
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Sign up for an Account for the REST Tutorial

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is moving to a new location, and this version will soon be retired.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is moving to a new location, and this version will soon be retired.

trans-unit.source: You can view the most recent version here: <externalLink><linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/service-bus-relay-rest-tutorial/</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/service-bus-relay-rest-tutorial/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can view the most recent version here: <externalLink><linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/service-bus-relay-rest-tutorial/</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/service-bus-relay-rest-tutorial/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: This is the first of four tasks required to create a basic REST-based <token>sb1</token> service.
trans-unit.target: This is the first of four tasks required to create a basic REST-based <token>sb1</token> service.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of all four tasks, see the <link xlink:href="286326f9-883b-4191-a7df-f107f3cbc26a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">REST Tutorial for AppFabric Service Bus</link>.
trans-unit.target: For an overview of all four tasks, see the <link xlink:href="286326f9-883b-4191-a7df-f107f3cbc26a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">REST Tutorial for AppFabric Service Bus</link>.

trans-unit.source: The first step is to create a <token>servicensd</token>, and to obtain a <newTerm>Shared Access Signature</newTerm> (SAS) key.
trans-unit.target: The first step is to create a <token>servicensd</token>, and to obtain a <newTerm>Shared Access Signature</newTerm> (SAS) key.

trans-unit.source: A <token>servicensd</token> provides an application boundary for each application exposed through the <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: A <token>servicensd</token> provides an application boundary for each application exposed through the <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: A SAS key is automatically generated by the system when a <token>servicensd</token> is created.
trans-unit.target: A SAS key is automatically generated by the system when a <token>servicensd</token> is created.

trans-unit.source: The combination of <token>servicensd</token> and SAS key provides a credential for <token>sb2</token> to authenticate access to an application.
trans-unit.target: The combination of <token>servicensd</token> and SAS key provides a credential for <token>sb2</token> to authenticate access to an application.

trans-unit.source: To create a service namespace and obtain a SAS key
trans-unit.target: To create a service namespace and obtain a SAS key

trans-unit.source: To create a <token>servicensd</token> in the Azure management portal, follow the steps in <link xlink:href="fa561f70-007c-45aa-b34d-56317dbbfc87" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</link>.
trans-unit.target: To create a <token>servicensd</token> in the Azure management portal, follow the steps in <link xlink:href="fa561f70-007c-45aa-b34d-56317dbbfc87" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</link>.

trans-unit.source: In the main window of the Azure management portal, click the name of the <token>servicensd</token> you created in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: In the main window of the Azure management portal, click the name of the <token>servicensd</token> you created in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Configure</ui> to view the shared access policies for the <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Configure</ui> to view the shared access policies for the <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the primary key for the <ui>RootManageSharedAccessKey</ui> policy, or copy it to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the primary key for the <ui>RootManageSharedAccessKey</ui> policy, or copy it to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: You will use this value later in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You will use this value later in this tutorial.
